QuestData.Title: Fate of the Horde
QuestData.Description: It is a wonder any of our troops survived that bloodbath on the Broken Shore. If not for Lady Sylvanas...$B$BHigh Overlord Saurfang has been asking for you at Grommash Hold. He will not say why... but he was insistent that I send you to him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to Grommash Hold and learn the fate of the Horde.

Objectives.Objective: Learn the Fate of the Horde
